1110110011100000 1001100011010111 1 -> sum: 1000010110111000, cout: 1
1110000011010101 1100001110101100 0 -> sum: 1010010010000001, cout: 1
1010110100010011 1000111111110001 0 -> sum: 0011110100000100, cout: 1
1111010001101001 0110000111000111 0 -> sum: 0101011000110000, cout: 1
0100000000000100 1110101101111111 0 -> sum: 0010101110000011, cout: 1
1000001010010101 1101111100111101 1 -> sum: 0110000111010011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
